forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a luminous sky, bright and inviting, yet tinged with the cool breath of the bay. The day is expected to hover around a crisp 59 degrees, gradually softening to the mid-50s as the sun arcs through its journey. A gentle north-northeast breeze carries a hint of salt, dancing through the streets and brushing against the weathered facades of the city. The forecast hints at the encroaching fog, expected to roll in later tonight, weaving a shroud of mystery that might inspire the creative soul. 

As you venture into this picturesque day, layers will be your friend; a light jacket or sweater will suffice, perfect for the cooler moments while the sun still offers warmth. It is a splendid day to stroll through the quiet streets or explore the art-laden alleys, where every corner tells a story. Consider stopping by a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the lingering scent of pastries, inviting you to pause and savor the moment. The burgeoning fog will come after dusk, an enchanting prelude to evening’s embrace, hinting at a thrilling mystery awaiting those who wander through the city’s cloaked paths later on.
